sentence.text: After exclusive analysis of 10 common variations of three hearing loss-related genes, gap junction-mediated intercellular transport, mtDNA12srRNA and regulation of pH, a novel truncated variant of SMPX, c.87dupA (p.Gly30Argfs*12) (NCBI ClinVar Submission ID: SUB3136126), was identified by whole-exome sequencing.
